import pandas as pd 
from pycaret.classification import *

train = pd.read_csv('../input/titanic/train.csv')
test = pd.read_csv('../input/titanic/test.csv')

label ='Survived'
clf1 = setup(data=train, target=label, silent=True)

# https://github.com/pycaret/pycaret/blob/fe22cdfb3fa63a27a3214d368674d4c9e1326eed/pycaret/classification.py
top3 = compare_models(n_select=3)
tuned_top3 = [tune_model(i) for i in top3]
blender = blend_models(tuned_top3)
stacker = stack_models(tuned_top3) 
best_model = automl(optimize='Accuracy')
predictions = predict_model(best_model, data=test)

submission = pd.read_csv('../input/titanic/gender_submission.csv')
submission[label] = predictions['Label']
submission.to_csv('submission.csv', index=False)
submission.head()
